TEXT.TITLE: INTERSTATE BAKERIES <IBC>BUYS MEXICAN FOOD FIRM
TEXT.BODY: Interstate Bakeries Corp said its Royal American Foods subsidiary agreed to buy the assets of Landshire Food Products Inc, a New-Mexico-based producer of packaged Mexican food products. Terms of the proposed transaction were not disclosed. Reuter
